live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.

34777.summary: Some customers in the Lower Mainland are experiencing Pixelation on Television  services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
34777.title: Mar 10 – Lower Mainland | Television Interruption - (Resolved)
